Just a small model i started working on, thought i'd post to get some activity back this section.

[img]http://puu.sh/iUbsf/eaecaa2810.jpg[/img] Comments, and feedback is welcome. :)

item.title: [WIP] Dragon Lord Melee [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @Ziva Ziva
item.description:
@Ziva wrote:

[quote=“hadlich4, post:4, topic:552397”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=671316.msg4489390#msg4489390 date=1436542764]

Id do this stuff more if it wasnt so time consuming to animate this stuff to be in the game lol

The more often you do it the less time consuming it becomes, sometimes it only takes half an hour to knock out a piece. Plus, you really should because you need the animation practice!
[/quote]

Yea im gunna have to learn the correct PRIs again because the ones in the tutorial from mr pot head are wrong i just cant remember what they are but i can worry about that stuff later down the road im gunna worry about game mechanics right now not the looks[/quote]

i made a tutorial for 317 and 718 ( on rune-server) you can check it out anytime ( models section ofcourse)

@amy nice work

Read full topic
